reviews.text: From tap at the brewpub. Clear golden amber color with off white head. Malty and light hoppy aroma, bread, caramel, grass, citrus. Moderate sweet and light bitter taste. Light to medium oily body with soft carbonation.
Bottle. Color hazy yellow with small white head. Aroma malt, hop, sweet, yeast. Taste sweet, yeast, dry.
I bought the bottle from Domus Birrae Roma. Nice aroma, nice flavor but thin body. Very easy to drink. Not bad at all. A nice choice.
